title: Vegan chocolate rum cheesecake
ingredients: ['170g ground almonds', '125g wholemeal flour', '150g margarine', '340g firm tofu', '100g demerara sugar', '7 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder', '4 tablespoons sunflower oil', '125ml soya milk', '4 tablespoons dark rum', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract']
